China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 1 月 15 日星期一 09:22:07 GMT 120
China growth seen slowing to 4.6% in 2024, raising heat on policymakersChina's economic growth is likely to slow to 4.6% in 2024, and cool further to 4.5% in 2025, a Reuters poll showed, raising the heat on policymakers to roll out more stimulus measures amid deflationary pressures and a severe property slump. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 07:26:01 GMT PVREDDYZYNJE3II2GPCIGFLHNY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-growth-seen-slowing-46-2024-raise-heat-policymakers-2024-01-15/Kevin Yao世界中国
Apple offers iPhone 15 at rare discount in China as competition intensifiesApple is offering rare discounts on its iPhones in China, cutting retail prices by as much as 500 yuan ($70) amid growing competitive pressure in the world's biggest smartphone market. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 06:58:29 GMT ALONH2D2JRMXVL7FEQFQGPUCIU https://www.reuters.com/technology/apple-offers-iphone-15-rare-discount-china-competition-intensizes-2024-01-15/Josh Ye技术
Philippines to develop islands in South China Sea - military chiefThe Philippines will develop islands in the South China Sea that it considers part of its territory to make them more habitable for troops, Manila's military chief Romeo Brawner told reporters on Monday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 06:50:43 GMT NLF5MLRRYN质子ONBXLXHWPMM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-develop-islands-south-china-sea-military-chief-2024-01-15/Reuters世界亚太地区
Taiwan loses ally Nauru to China in post-election ployTaiwan lost one of its few remaining diplomatic allies Nauru to China on Monday, just days after it elected a new president, and accused China of attempting to pressure it while it affirmed the will of Taiwanese to go out into the world. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 06:18:51 GMT 74OIPFSS7JJTRDA25IRLR33W34 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-loses-first-ally-post-election-nauru-goes-over-china-2024-01-15/Kirsty Needham, Yimou Lee世界亚太地区
Japanese firms expect China's 2024 economic prospects to remain grimJapanese firms in China expect economic prospects in the world's second-largest economy to remain grim this year, according to a report from the Japanese Chamber of Commerce and Industry in China released on Monday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 06:01:38 GMT QD4GIPUOX5MZBPFHAXBUCHH2YA https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/japanese-firms-expect-chinas-2024-economic-prospects-remain-grim-2024-01-15/Reuters市场亚洲市场
Boeing 737 MAX deliveries to China face fresh delay after Alaska incident -WSJBoeing faces a fresh delay in the resumption of deliveries of 737 MAX jets to China after the mid-air blowout of a panel on an Alaska Airlines MAX 9 this month, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 05:35:59 GMT 3UWWWORCQ2FI3PIT4GNZ6UQTGJQ https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/boeing-737-max-deliveries-china-face-fresh-delay-after-alaska-incident-wsj-2024-01-15/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
